name: Siren Song
description:
Entry for the 2020.2 Brackeys Jam. The theme "Rewind" made me think of a tornado siren, so I applied that concept here. You "Rewind" the siren each time you want to fire.

Use the power of your siren to fend of the zombies, but be careful, when you run of juice you need to wind them up again.

Controls - Click the megaphone icon to shoot and click and hold the arrow icon to wind up.

Playable in browser but download and run for best visuals.
